mapper.select: SELECT t_notice.id, t_notice.sender_id, t_notice_message_info.content, t_notice_message_info.post_id, t_notice_message_info.post_title, t_notice_message_info.source_type, t_notice.create_time, t_notice.status FROM t_notice JOIN t_notice_message_info ON t_notice.msg_info_id = t_notice_message_info.id WHERE t_notice.receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND t_notice_message_info.msg_type = #{msgType} order by status
